content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace at (2.0, -56.0)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Area at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1.0, 1.0) and (3.0, 1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)

### Additional Smelting Area at position(2.0, 7.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2.0, 7.0) and (4.0, 7.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for item handling
- Connected chest network at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Line Setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuit production
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for material handling
- Connected chest network containing copper cable and electronic circuits

### Water Pumping System
Consists of:
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water system
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production areas:
- Belt networks running from mining areas to smelting areas
- Belt systems connecting assembly machines
- Complex belt network for material distribution throughout the factory

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Remove existing entities if you need to place something in their position

### Power network issues
- Multiple entities are not receiving power (assembling machines, labs)
- Ensure proper connection of electrical poles
- Connect power generators (steam engines) to the electrical network

### Fluid system connectivity issues
- Several offshore pumps and pipes show "No fluid present in connections"
- Ensure proper connection of all fluid-carrying entities
- Connect boilers and steam engines to water supply

### Production bottlenecks
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt"
- Assembling machines lacking required materials
- Ensure proper supply chain of materials to production facilities

### Fuel management
- Several burner inserters and mining drills are running out of fuel
- Implement consistent fuel supply system
- Monitor and refuel entities regularly
